events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your skills in software development and coding.
A recruiter specialized in engineering talent has been assigned to your case and will contact you with next steps.
The initial screening call was completed, and you demonstrated strong fundamentals in software engineering concepts.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions and for confirming your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 2 PM UTC with our lead software engineer.
The technical interview was successfully completed. You showcased excellent problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC to discuss culture fit and compensation.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed alignment with the company values and benefits.
We are pleased to propose a formal offer for the Software Engineer role including salary and benefits discussions.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer; you have indicated enthusiasm about joining the software engineering team.
We have received confirmation that you have accepted the offer and are excited to onboard you as our new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started, and you will receive resources to get started with our engineering projects.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as a full member of our engineering team. We look forward to your success.
